trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse button related events.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for musen button relaterte hendelser.

trans-unit.source: MouseButtonEventArgs is used with the following events: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>, and the corresponding tunneling events.
trans-unit.target: MouseButtonEventArgs brukes med følgende hendelser: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>, og tilhørende tunnelering hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, tidsstempel og <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The logical Mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiske musenheten som er forbundet med denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet da inndataene ble utført.

trans-unit.source: The mouse button whose state is being described.
trans-unit.target: Museknappen der tilstand som beskrives.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, tidsstempel <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The logical mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiske musenheten som er forbundet med denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet hendelsen inntraff.

trans-unit.source: The button associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Knappen som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stylus-enhet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the button associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for knappen for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The state the button is in.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen er i.

trans-unit.source: Gets the button associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter knappen for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The button which was pressed.
trans-unit.target: -Knappen som ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times the button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange ganger den ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: One use of ClickCount is to determine whether a double mouse click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Én brukes ClickCount til å fastsette om det har oppstått et doble museklikk.

trans-unit.source: Some classes expose events for a double-click, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Noen klasser viser hendelser for et Dobbeltklikk, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelse på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: When a double click event is not exposed on a class, a double click can be detected by using the ClickCount property on the event data.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse for Dobbeltklikk ikke er eksponert på en klasse, kan et Dobbeltklikk oppdages ved hjelp av egenskapen ClickCount på hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: The number of times the mouse button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Antall ganger museknappen ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hendelsesbehandling på en måte typespesifikke, noe som kan øke hendelsen system effektivitet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kaster generisk behandlingsprogrammet som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>og aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om denne implementeringen mønsteret og årsaker til den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>og [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Generell behandlingsprogrammet å kalle på en typespesifikke måte.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Målet å kalle behandlingsprogrammet på.
